mapper.select: SELECT e.*, c.title AS course_name, u.username AS teacher_name FROM exam e LEFT JOIN course c ON e.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN user u ON e.teacher_id = u.id WHERE e.status = 'published' AND e.end_time > NOW() ORDER BY e.create_time DESC
SELECT e.*, c.title AS course_name, u.username AS teacher_name FROM exam e LEFT JOIN course c ON e.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN user u ON e.teacher_id = u.id WHERE e.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam (title, description, course_id, teacher_id, start_time, end_time, duration, total_score, status, create_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{courseId}, #{teacherId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{duration}, #{totalScore}, #{status}, NOW())
